text: Olivian Laurențiu Surugiu (born 28 February 1990) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder.Craiova lui Mititelu pregătește noul sezon » Transferuri de marcă bifate de olteni!. gsp.ro ==Honours== Hermannstadt *Cupa României: Runner-up 2017–18 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Craiova Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC U Craiova 1948 players Category:CS Turnu Severin players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:SCM Râmnicu Vâlcea players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:CS Pandurii Târgu Jiu players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players Category:FC Hermannstadt players
title: Olivian Surugiu
